style-transfer

Documentation

Setup
Introduction
Example Output

A simple tensorflow implementation of style transfer, as outlined in “A Neural Algorithm of Artistic Style”.

Read the Introduction to learn about the code. Feel free to download the source and tweak the code for your own results!


Requirements:

Tensorflow
Pillow
Scipy
numpy

References:

The original paper “A Neural Algorithm of Artistic Style” here
MatConvNet VGG-19 available here
The VGG-19 paper here
VGG-19 details here
